revised_title: High Pressure Neurological Syndrome: Mechanistic Studies and Drug Interactions
tldr: This study investigates the high pressure neurological syndrome (h.p.n.s.), a major barrier to deep-sea exploration, and its effects on the central nervous system. The research explores the role of monoamines and amino acids, particularly GABA, in the development of h.p.n.s. and the potential for drug interactions to protect against convulsive actions of pressure.
